headline: UnitedHealth Exits South America With Banmedica Sale

headline: How UnitedHealth will be getting 'back to basics' in 2026
summary: UnitedHealth Group (UNH) is among the five stocks that have been dragging the Dow Jones Industrial Average (^DJI) lower in 2025, dropping by 33% year-to-date. This month also marks one year since UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was killed in New York City in December 2024. Columbia University health policy professor Meghan Fitzgerald explains her view on public sentiment toward UnitedHealth and the American healthcare industry. Fitzgerald is also Grey Ghost Capital's private equity investor, a board member of Tenet Healthcare, and a former nurse. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Oscar Health Rises As GOP Moderates Rebel Over ACA
summary: Oscar Health rallied on Wednesday morning amid an intraparty GOP rebellion over ACA subsidies, though other S&P 500 health care stocks lost more ground.  Centene, the top ACA Marketplace insurer by membership, and HCA Healthcare, the largest U.S. hospital operator, fell for a third straight session, with much of the damage coming Tuesday as House Speaker Mike Johnson signaled he wouldn't allow a vote on a bipartisan compromise plan to extend the subsidies.  On Monday, Morgan Stanley downgraded HCA to underweight from equal weight on Monday, saying its high valuation is at a peak as Washington reins in growth of the ACA Marketplaces and Medicaid supplemental payments.

content.title: Oscar Health Rises As GOP Moderates Rebel Over ACA
content.summary: Oscar Health rallied on Wednesday morning amid an intraparty GOP rebellion over ACA subsidies, though other S&P 500 health care stocks lost more ground.  Centene, the top ACA Marketplace insurer by membership, and HCA Healthcare, the largest U.S. hospital operator, fell for a third straight session, with much of the damage coming Tuesday as House Speaker Mike Johnson signaled he wouldn't allow a vote on a bipartisan compromise plan to extend the subsidies.  On Monday, Morgan Stanley downgraded HCA to underweight from equal weight on Monday, saying its high valuation is at a peak as Washington reins in growth of the ACA Marketplaces and Medicaid supplemental payments.

headline: Health Insurers Now Get a Pulse: 3 Stocks to Jump in 2026
summary: Health insurers are regaining pricing control and margin visibility, putting UnitedHealth, CVS Health and Centene back in focus as managed care regains its pulse.
